title: Pasir Ris Town Park: Playgrounds and Fishing Pond
blurb: Active day out with playground, fishing, cycling.
description: Pasir Ris Town Park offers a variety of activities for families and children. The park features a playground where children can climb, jump, swing, and slide, promoting psychomotor and social skills development. There is also a beginner-level fishing pond for those interested in angling. Families can enjoy cycling in and around the park, taking in the scenic views and enjoying the outdoors. The park provides a great opportunity for an active and fun-filled day for the whole family, with options for both play and relaxation in a natural setting. Perfect for a family outing.
datetime_display: friendly activities There are classes and activities to help the young ones learn new skills such as skating, horse riding, sandcastle building and more

title: Punggol Park: Picnics, Cycling, and Playground Fun
blurb: Picnic, cycle, and explore playground features.
description: Punggol Park offers a variety of activities for families and children. Visitors can choose to picnic under the shade of trees, providing a relaxing and enjoyable experience. The park also offers cycling paths for families to explore the area on two wheels. Children can enjoy the playground features, which are designed to promote physical activity and social interaction. With its diverse range of activities, Punggol Park is an ideal destination for a fun day out with the children, offering something for everyone to enjoy in a natural and scenic environment. Perfect for a family outing.

title: Sengkang Riverside Park: Nature Playgarden & Playground
blurb: Nature playgarden and inclusive playground for kids.
description: Sengkang Riverside Park offers a delightful day out for families with children. The park features a nature playgarden, allowing children to develop a sense of adventure and discovery as they explore play features made up of natural materials. Additionally, there is an inclusive playground designed to cater to children of all abilities, ensuring that everyone can participate and enjoy the play experience. With these features, Sengkang Riverside Park provides a welcoming and engaging environment for children to connect with nature and have fun. Perfect for a family outing.

title: Bidadari Park: Treehouse, Slides, and Zipline Fun
blurb: Exciting play area with treehouse, slides, zipline.
description: Bidadari Park offers an exciting and adventurous play area for children. The park features a 5-meter tall treehouse, providing a unique and elevated play experience. Children can enjoy the thrill of sliding down the various slides and soaring through the air on the zipline. The park also incorporates nature play elements, allowing children to connect with the natural environment while engaging in imaginative play. With its diverse range of play features, Bidadari Park promises a fun-filled and memorable experience for children of all ages. Perfect for a family outing.

title: Child-Friendly Activities at National Parks Board
blurb: Classes to learn skating, horse riding, and more.
description: Discover a variety of child-friendly activities and classes offered by the National Parks Board. Engage in activities such as skating, horse riding, and sandcastle building to develop new skills. Explore nature-related activities to learn about Singapore's biodiversity and heritage. Visit the National Orchid Garden at the Botanic Gardens and introduce your family to the history of Vanda Miss Joaquim, our national flower. Learn about trees in Singapore and find more learning resources related to parks and nature. Perfect for families looking to spend quality time outdoors and learn about the environment.

title: National Orchid Garden at the Botanic Gardens
blurb: Introduce your family to Singapore's national flower.
description: Visit the National Orchid Garden at the Botanic Gardens and introduce your family to the history of Vanda Miss Joaquim, our national flower. Explore the vibrant displays of orchids from around the world, learn about their unique characteristics, and discover the fascinating story behind Singapore's national flower. The garden offers a serene and educational experience for families, with interactive exhibits and guided tours available. Perfect for families who appreciate natural beauty and want to learn more about the diverse world of orchids. Enjoy a leisurely stroll through the garden and immerse yourselves in the sights and scents of these exquisite flowers.
datetime_display: friendly nature activities to discover more about biodiversity and heritage in Singapore
